item.title: scan_local_network_with_nmap
item.description: You want to find out which devices are available in your local area network - connected to your router. The tool “nmap” can do this. The command nmap 192.168.1.0/24 returns exactly that. I followed the instructions here from the raspberry pi stackexchange
